snippet: Lizette Salas, the daughter of Mexican immigrants who used golf to become the first in her family to earn a college degree, has earned a spot on the L.P.G.A. Tour.
abstract: Lizette Salas, the daughter of Mexican immigrants who used golf to become the first in her family to earn a college degree, has earned a spot on the LPGA Tour.
lead_paragraph: Lizette Salas, the daughter of Mexican immigrants who used golf to become the first in her family to earn a college degree, has earned a spot on the L.P.G.A. Tour.

headline.seo: Lizette Salas Earns Spot on L.P.G.A. Tour
headline.main: A Path to Opportunity Through the Greens
headline.print_headline: A Path to Opportunity Through the Greens
